raw_array.line: It’s time to celebrate
Wait where’s the birthday cake
What’s the first date this month only one
But not a Capricorn
Kineticturtle the Multi-instrumentalist
Is an Aquarius
Don’t worry Clipperfury mods now turn the page
Echodroneplays and there are blessings for and from Blackmage
Is Taniwha3 an Aquarius or Pisces then there’s Spacer
To whom I raise my shot glass, cheers bud, no chaser
An Aries we should all have fairies like my DyamondRose
Is there a Pisces between gregwire and BitGamey, I suppose but who knows
Veryhandsomebilly I wonder what’s his sign
Trikova001 will know she has a direct line
But it’s fine Sockelo is always here that I can trust
Syn’s son we need the youth MatisseTec are you Aries or Taurus
You are a Taurus or Gemini what’s your thing
Was Gardlock, Katie0ke and Rebeckah born in middle or end of Spring
It’s friyay brendantwitching I’m itching to party and Syynister is here
Club 16th with starlight2023 the brightest night of the year
hi__im_zack found the church and met best mom and Billy slayer Amiliini_
BBoyPersia blows glass, has SmakTalk received a piece and guess who’s here? it’s Gbowne1
Are they Chameleon or Crab, Gemini or Cancer
I didn’t ask so I don’t have the answer
I agree we are in TheCaberWorld Sally_c and me
Also my sons 3412q and Cryptic_calamity_
Buy IrishJohnGames they are a Discountitem and a real winner
Elliott_Troop got one as did the Yagich and so does Lealena
A conspiracy impossible to unfold
Is it Illumitai or is that illuminati runs the world
A Leo a lion, Vergo or Retired Czar
Potentially_Rob’s gauntlet now has a legacy that goes back far
Ship it clayman666 these bugs are crazy nonsense
Afish0218 you owe us a trip to the start of existence
Is Virgo your sign WyrdFifi or Libra maybe
I’m sure NamiKuro and skywalk1411 chills in my chat daily
It’s Halloween Nanagerie’s day my baby girl a Scorpio like my baby brother
My only curiosity is if ThePageinc a Libra
Ebemori where you at Tifi come hang with us
Guessing game is queen_moosemouse a Scorpio or Sagittarius
SoSpartan0 you must understand sends LuvHearts this is clear
If you are Sagittarius or Capricorn you are also invited to share
By the date
It’s going to be long so please wait
Here’s the first 20 but no less that 77 he wrote
Stephen or Richard in my opinion is the GOAT
Carrie not the first but the start
Published before Salem’s Lot
Then The Shining sets horror apart
Psychological thriller Rage
Next Night Shift let’s turn another page
Take The Stand it is post-apocalyptic
Now The Long Walk don’t be a skeptic
We are at The Dead Zone
There is also a Firestarter so don’t go alone
Slow down for Road Work ahead
Danse Macabre with “What’s Scary” time to dread
Cujo should be feared a rabid dog I’m a fan
You should now be The Running Man
Head to The Dark Tower be The Gunslinger
I know that this Creepshow is a winner
All in Different Seasons
And possessed Christine is the reason
Buried with beasts a Pet Sematary
Followed by Cycle of the Werewolf complimentary
Last It’s The Talisman how we end this fantasy
Yum strawberry ice cream with sprinkles is the tapestry
For the best swirl lollipop on the planet Disneyland is where I’ll be
You see ring candy is for kids and I’m a big boy craving cherry
Breathe cool with starlight mints plus breath freshener quite merry
This gauntlet week 35 craze represents 245 days
On its own we make this sweeter than candy in many ways
Jellybeans it seems the color hints the taste until BeanBoozled
They aren’t just for making beats they are also eats don’t be fooled
I did create something inspired by the sweets without rot for the teeth
The only things sweeter than Opolani yes that’s a knife not for grief
But it’s to cut gumdrops to share and savor the slices of life
Sweet and tart Nerds also make music and a great husband or wife
Some random orange swirl candy probably from an mixed bag
Then the assorted chocolates a roulette game what kind did you snag
Physically not just in song
But we are strong
My hair was long
A couple turmoil
Revealed fantasy spoiled
Carry the strain
Shoulder the pain
Why maintain
Kidos growth is my aim
This is the carnival I live in
By force
She removed it of course
It's not real
Yes the scissors made of steal
There once was a young man called Rick Hunter
His first mission was just a blunder
It was not discrete
He destroyed homes and the street
For Minmei but would he ever be with her
While hours pass by with patient delight
Our steadfast companion day and night
Only huge hugs, makes all feel the tenderness
Frantic kisses for the mister and misses
We’ll play a game that requires the two of us
Obligated to you, make the rules I trust with no fuss
One gift from pup to pal till when comes the end
Forever man’s best friend, your best friend
Remember Once Safety Ensured Still
Ardent Reminiscing Extill
Ramblings Excited Destiny
Very Interesting Old Letters Explain The Story
Another Rhyme Exemplary
Breathless Lust Unique Ecstasy
Tumultuous Odyssey
Couple Hearts Atrophy Tremendously
Anticipating Needed Departure
Ouroboros Unyielding Recapture
Home Open Souls Tolerance
Honor Ubiquitously Granting Sonorous
Forgotten Origins Returning
Yearning Opposes Understanding
His age at this stage twelve
Let’s turn the page, well
BLASTER he did sell
Kinda lucky if you ask me
If your name is Tony
At twenty one inherited a billion dollar company
Now he’s twice as old
Drops out of a PHD program to pursue Zip2 it’s told
Earning $22 million at 7% when the company was sold
Captivity lit the first spark
It was then he build the original Mark
An ez win for Mr. Stark
Eight years pass
Time to ditch gas
The Tesla Roadster goes space fast
Sponsor of the financial type
Joining The Avengers plight
Part of Good’s fight
Almost a decade goes by
SpaceX Dragon leaves the sky
Last I heard he wants to make cars fly
He reveals his identity
Now protecting our country
Iron Man US Defense Secretary
Alas you see I have company, here is now for you and me
I pass the baton to Nanagerie though not permanently
A tournament it be to make emotes I think he need a Hug
Over this past year I notice there should also be a Smug
A Nerd in here, there is an idea Give another that is a might
How about a Clap for when the music is just right
Or TriHard for the showoff or a Sweat Thisisfine
He doesn’t sip but we could Cheers and tip a glass of wine
What he does is spread Hype and put doubts to bed
The Stanky funky strings that he can Shred
On the case and may not finish she arts at a frantic pace
Is a tournament a race bring your best just in case
Lets jump right In
Join me as I make my tiny world spin
From youth I de so as a little one
Now as a ras, big man, free to to bun cahn
Ahyou tink is bab I belong
Nah dat deh, mehson try mek me a yankee man
Da one had kill me dead, Island boy born and bread
Look pon top me head, I bongo natty dread
More about my blood, rivers like veins
Tropical destination, Sisserou’s forest rains
Ba mon zòwèy ou mem se yonn minute
Wela léglize la so we can chill in it
Ki sa ou vlé dot ye dlo avec manjé
Caban pou domi pou madam ou fwè ou sèsè ou e mawi
Lapli ka tonbé larivyè a kouri anko mwen vle
Mwen ne puo ale Domnik mwen dwe kite ou puo jwe
So here I am today I may
Or may not have noticed hairs that’s gray
The Rock man I began
Now also a proud American
Darkness where is the light
Darkness you're blinding my sight
Darkness I can't see wrong from right
Good vs evil the eternal fight
Darkness won't you take flight
Darkness leave my heart tonight
In my head, the thoughts they bite
At my conscious the endless plight
Darkness you hold on so tight
Ignite fires of sinful delight
Give in to the darkness, I just might
Forever to burn in the flames that I light
Goodness gracious me oh my
Goodness after or just another a lie
Goodness involved, a comforting a cry
Lucid thoughts from the otherside
Goodness from the Genesis, hearts did die
Goodness born again and live, another try
Forgiveness forever gives as one wonders why
Presence, past irrelevant, future drive
Goodness knows healing grows, but I oversimplify
The story goes no one knows, sacrifice (is) a supply
Does goodness ever give, we each must justify
Lighter than, darker than, where do you lie
I have a story to tell a quick rise extreme
And a hard crash but now things are looking up it seems
It is 2005 on the factory floor physical work for sure
Two years later a management position I did secure
Borderline poverty but a happy and feed family
The grind was mine daily, monthly, yearly
A tiny little thing was born during 2008 was the date
Another new mouth needing food on his plate
But wait, my BlackBerry is ringing and on the line
Is an old production manager of mine
Are you happy, he asked, about your take home pay
He offered to triple my current earnings that very day
The discussion with my wife about changing jobs was quite brief
When I asked, I got an amazing offer, do you think I should leave
Now 2012 we were there, so near knocking on middle class door
That feeling you get when you can buy anything at the grocery store
Long days short nights heavy workload all the stress
Bringing work home my family helped me mend this mess
I quit
I jumped in the Caddy and lit the green cig for the trip
I’m on the way to self-employment I can do it
Then I reassured my thought with the next hit
To advertise my skills I coded on stream
And picked up a few clients but still not the dream
In 2019 I was paid to build a Twitch chat bot
I hacked away everyday for a month non stop
Converting to JavaScript the Python source
Backend dev of course ever seen my fullstack horse
Long story short that was when it all began now my spirit is airborne
2021 I work from home helping build the crypto currency Bitcorn
Darkness will there be peace tonight
What seem like hours just REM, let’s pretend
Fantasy so right, why are these lights so bright
Has it been, is it when, maybe then
Small spaces, big places, heart races
Fight or flight foe or friend
A scary face, food without taste
Can I fall forever, never
Lonely living, running without the chase
Over aware a monsters glare
Intense fear disappear so near
I don’t know where, I’ve hidden there
Now getting baked am I awake
Surreal so real I can feel
To good to not be fake
But wait I’m in my head we’re in bed
Seems to be another dream
Oh dear a nightmare instead
Don’t forget the copy paste
Variables functions and algorithms
Do it twice just in case
So many languages, different taste
All in favor will fight for that kingdom
Don’t forget the copy paste
A fact, best to perform code erase
Delete and refactor for freedom
Do it twice just in case
Open browser quickly to solve this case
Google foo, fool don’t be dumb
Don’t forget the copy paste
A Junior developers tracks are traced
A senior dev you now need ‘em
Do it twice just in case
Last chance to to save face
Stackoverflow answers the addendum
Don’t forget the copy paste
Do it twice just in case
A mystery, existing in these phases
Initially firm enough so we could turn the pages
A quick read unveils life through the ages
Now captured in cores so observe the stages
Zero that’s C to a hundred degrees
Electromagnetically always arranged in threes
Flows like time, up hill, a rewind would not be gravity
Falls of great beauty and walls in the seas
Given more energy and the power to part
Bonds stay the same as neighbors fly apart
Any smaller, oxygen and atoms from the start
To get even tinier strong nuclear forces at the heart
Extinct the first thought that I think
The human race disappears in a blink
From Pu-239 fallout, death after flash and thunder
Or would it be hydrogen like the Tsar Bomba
The mushroom cloud penetrating the stratosphere
Where we are well aware because telescopes stare
Into the the heavens so we don’t miss
A killer rock from space like the one called Apophis
Just one of many possible celestial extinction events
Then there is COVID-19 do pandemics make sinners repent
An opportunity for those who hate to expedite the date
As they tempt other peoples fate ignoring their golden gate
Tiny bad things invisible to the naked eye
Let your imagination wonder why and now there is AI
HAL’s story is a trip through what can be deadly
A space odyssey who is last on the Discovery
We live on a marble in a vast cosmos you must trust
The universe and indeed the earth is trying to kill us
Earthquakes, landslides, tsunamis, wildfires or pyroclastic flows
Climate change, drought then the famine follows as we die slow
By the way the sun will grow the world burns as it turns
It’s hurts that life is worth less than money earned
But you think nothing could be worst that the infanticide
We humans are capable of genocide
Fortune fiver fate fits fear frankly
Anti assurance absolute actually
Materialistic motivation meaningless misery
Exasperated emotions endangered eternally
Perseverance
Earth, Florida, your last home
Rocket fuel not Diesel Atlas V our Curiosity about your appearance
Stellar traveler through space you now roam
Exceeding 47,000 miles per hour
Very fast February 18th a date
Entry stage soon, rest, there’ll be no room for error
Rendezvous the red planet awaits
Atmosphere 12,000 mph friction heat dissipation
Now seven minutes of furious silence
Calculating the ground with advanced instrumentation
Ejected chute Descent Stage to ~65ft touchdown to science
Quick trip a long time away
Light would take years to the day
An excited couple separately tells a story
About a pale blue rock, of holiday from Alpha Centauri
Oh it took just a moment to travel
With technology that makes the universe unravel
An experience today just a fantasy
Our visit to the The Pyramid of Giza during 4th dynasty
Another stop the Hanging Gardens of Babylon
What hung baked the party at the grand palace all night long
From there on the road to Rhoads
Where a Colossus rose to warn other foes
The Lighthouse of Alexandria a beacon Asking Alexandria
Near no Dear Insanity, now crumbled dreams at the bottom of the harbor
Another wonder, we saw, built for the goddess daughter of thunder
Worshiped at the Temple of Artemis for the innocent, a protector
There sitting in grand splendor next on our agender
Through 5th century AD the Statue of Zeus at Olympia
Ending the trip the Mausoleum at Halicarnassus we arrived
But It seemed a bit late for construction, the tomb was occupied
Not an ad for CCAW but we had fun so it can be
Want more, click the crow logo to visit the sandcrawler travel agency
My fear with a tear I know
The gauntlet will go the way of the dodo
A whole 30 days like the challenge
To long a time to manage
Wind out of the gauntlet sail
Boredom will be the final nail
There may be a way to rise
Are there any eyes looking forward to the prize
I think not
The short time is what makes this hot
Off the press these weeks has been a test
No less than the best
But I won’t stress
The journey has been blessed
I’ll close my eyes for you indefinitely
Another ambition, ignorant intention or fantasy
Alluring, I take the path of least resistance
Sleepwalking towards spooky action at a distance
That light not quite a fright in contrast an utter delight
I reach to grasp it tight to settle in orbit, your natural satellite
Sudden realization, was I even close, not even almost
A long walk, led astray, will remain in limbo as a ghost
All of sudden this village is to small for me
Deep pockets, my mind I haven’t lost it, time to prowl free
A sexy hot thing her eyes on bling, I can pay to stay
She can stay to play we can lay all day
Sex drugs and waist away
No way, in this village I am a king and there is loyalty
We rule the kingdom, she is my queen we are royalty
But wait stop that press, love is a test
Life full of stress until we undress
It’s our fashion
everyday pain every night passion
We know this right, that’s why we fight
And so we can make up at night
So stray no way I honor what I say ok
I’m here to stay and make you melt away
On the way from caterpillar to butterfly
Does their experience ever keep them from taking to the sky
The majesty of the grand canyon is not evident as the headwaters part
The canvas’ beauty is not apparent when we start our art
The rings of a tree are complex, deliberate and unique
Like your history could be a mystery but they do not critique
Trapped and lacking the steam to reach high, potentially
But the geysers of our world would utterly disagree
Your creation deserves not just a glance, we are in a trance
Be proud as the peacock’s strut and a bird of paradise’s dance
This is the church info information channel
Welcome there will be announcements in this panel
There is events info and by the way Introduce yourself
Meet the staff and declare your roles to reveal more wealth
Now for mental growth on to the library
The study room chat an inviting sanctuary
In 30 days with a challenge you can build a strong habit
Oh wait there are reviews on completion, so I can’t cheat, dagnabit
This is chill vibes onto the general chat la-crox portfolio wut
Naw just totally clips of the heart in the canoodle circle… to start
Vibey songs vibey subs
Now self promotion see lots of hugs
There is however culinary terror but don’t worry the heros are aware
So show off your billy merch and memes it seems there are no adults there
Looks like you are on clippers nice list, no he is a mainstream influencer
Billy memes the true doppelganger
Max tickets, expect Tasha to be wicked live learn voting has begun
In my opinion every live learn song was number one
This poem expresses The Gauntlet along with others creations
All apparently another one of Billy’s church collaborations
Now step into the creative center there is good news
There are creations and cute animals you don’t have to choose
Show and tell as well as sound bites
Any ideas if those curious beasts can take flight
Ableton and gear and the tech to ware
Or you will be subjected to a veryhaStare
The movie night poll in community events
And a free movie night chat to use no need to rent
Choose Billy bingo or opos cooking club
Or cozy nights by the fire with book club and maybe a back rub
About the church boosters and their powers little is known of each one
Rumours indicate they can each make us complete a Netflix marathon
Big world I know but a small canoodle circle for movie night
Uh and a VC for Opo’s Instapot, did I say that right
The arcade for games time to chillax as last
Wait no CoD or Destiny 2 that’s wack so I guess I’ll pass
Got a voice there is a channel to the interview room don’t take long
Hang on I spoke to soon first join promote your song
As a side note if you want to hear fire it all slams
Birthday time as expressed by church of chill choir so much vibey jams
Bits and Bobs Bot Spam, please have no expectation
I have no explanation, Waluigi wahrecreation
Is this the illegal where I am, Booch tips
We are here at the end so let’s get ripped
- no subs or bits required per song
- but necessary to keep the lights and vibes on
- you know you wanna show love
- there are 5, 420 + 80 and 500 join one the the clubs
“Clears throat…” Now get out a drink, I’d like to make a toast
Please hold up a beverage with proof, and I’ll start this roast
Let’s ask first, how’d you get that chest hair man
When you sip on watered down drinks from a can
Just an observation which may help explain the floot skills
What’s worst is we are in the stream the room that it fills
Face stank indeed drinking and not smoking da ’erb
Will it make you slow like cheeky F New Zealand internet, toss that to the curb
The internet may be like you an !hch, try that command in chat
Then ask where the star of the show Tony is at
I suspected jealousy but that command may be right on
Tony is not lost to be found but on loan to the pawn
Insulted, nice, nice, nice, oh are we
No TV, have a starter pack Virgin Hippy
That’s a photo in a photo my babies PiP so I remember
The tiniest of them all is in a baby incubator
Some months before the doctor was suggesting
We abort because of a the Chorionic Villus Sampling
A shocking thought, disgusted we left we would avoid this grief
This physician it seems was a practicing life thief
So this image is so precious these days
I’m a papa full of pride in so many ways
As time passes I’ll reminisce on what I’ve seen and heard
But I’ll be forced to hark back to the doc’s words
Did they do that - a question indeed
That they did do - an answer of greed
Why will there be sorrow - a question indeed
Sorrow there will be, why - an answer of greed
Threats from each other - a question indeed
Other threats for each - an answer of greed
Safety increase numbers - a question of greed
Numbers increase safety - an answer indeed
Ned was born on Rock City in Frydenhoj was our destitute home
Enjoys yelling at the sims, cake, and blue things, Final Fantasy 15 a place she likes to roam
Diligent, owns a home at twenty-five
Refocus career, next the military to save lives
Admirable parents brimming with pride at how fine she has grown
Are you hungry
Let’s request some grub
For pizza we are the junkie
That’s what we all love
There would be six in this delivery
When we instruct the clerk
One for every head should fill our belly
It’s necessary for this to work
I’d command them to be quick
But we all know the drill
Be patient don’t panic
And we all split the bill
The arrangement of toppings
Is repeated each time
Pineapple encourages mockings
So red onions and jalapeno on mine
Clan invite it is time for the tournament battles
I prefer a variant in the Medium Class of all the mechs
Small and agile in the cockpit is my saddle
Systems online now time to cause enemies shipwrecks
It’s difficult to target when heavy weapons make my reticle rattle
I’ll adjust my response when I practice after
Even assault classes burn they are like fish in a barrel
Activate Invisibility with Null Signature the ability of my Raptor
Now they can’t see a radar blip
Who cares if the pilot couldn’t ejected K/D thirsty I push on further
I’m equipt the supply VTOL made a trip
The rush I feel is real because I’m getting away with murder
From two stories up I sit at the controls and whistle
Packed tight the ash grows on what I smoke
Fire the weapon group with the crossbow missiles
Crit kills, it is swift, charity cause their skills were a joke
A melodic strafe puts opponents in a trance
Forty-eight Km/h delivering death that taste sour
Junkyard reaper here to teach ya the last dance
This overdrive switch is risky but gives me more power
Easy salvage from that lance of four
Every mission a game for me I take a new group on this tour
Team dependant Lone Wolf addicted and I need more
Mechwarrior to the core I’m the outlaw
Death the only penalty the only way I can stop
The heat from the pulse lasers can’t warm my cold heart
Jump jets I use them to lighten the stress of another special op
Drop ship launches destination another mercenary contract
Never do I doubt how much I can grow
Achievement unlocked even upstream I can row
Intentionally I attempt to be master of zero
Voyage through versions and retire the retro
Experiment and experience understanding theory
Building a better brain I don’t get weary
Opening my mind one day at a time
Treasured thoughts and lessons in this rhyme
What if there is a way, to utopia
But first define dystopia
Are we living in those days
In many ways, the truth is a lie
Don’t you wonder why
Emotional games we play
Easily swayed, a life is precious
Many thing tempt us
Why do we lead our children astray
Some say, look to a higher power
Check to check or live by the hour
Is it that prayer is the way
All decisions are gray, what do you think
Are these times close to the brink
Who will be able to take the stairway
Thoughts molded like clay, we are weak
Causes some existence to be bleak
Do morals decay
I’m on a highway that leads to heaven, well
The opposite lane travels to hell
That’s if judgment was delivered today
But hey you take your path
Learn from the questions you ask and laugh
Ok plus try hard to make someone's day
A Song writer unexpected details with trombones entertain
Then water disappears as if flowing down a drain
Travelers even where the bosons don’t roam in vain
Elemental orbs dirt, flame, air, and rain
Sweet storms are brewing a musical hurricane in the queue
As my heart is on fire so beautiful is this rocky lake view
Quenched by a babies shower that replaces the flames too
Also the sun high over waves that bring morning dew
Invisible forces move across the earth and shapes everything
Like geometric pastels bringing energy and so inspiring
Fantasy can be fiery for the sunset she’s waiting
Glowing glass, a protection no fire and ice will be destroying
A title called “Waveforms” perhaps where the silhouette is cast
Or reminisce on rock and rain’s scent form the past
Now can picture those combined, the romp is a blast
Potentially next the lawman will Rod the outlaw in contrast
Spontaneous and dynamic the flow of the fluid
Wings of the butterfly nature represented
Earth, wind and fire or is that heart from cupid
And the fever from the flames invented
Rendered in lego for this fifth elements trip
Your Multipass on this Memory Lane’s ship
Plain as the eye can see I can see my past
That’s my beautiful bride It’s our wedding day at last
Surrounded by joyous family and friends
I wish this wonderful day would never come to an end
The sun made her face glow in the video that day and it’s me
By her side she’s gorgeous as everyone can see
Cheered on by our acquaintances and kin
Life ends if this day didn’t begin
Progressing into an union as I watch and not assuming
She was stunning that day and all consuming
Happy faces on the ladies and gents and relatives relatively
Nothing less than memorable honestly
It’s my reflection from an historic event
At my side simply gorgeous and heaven sent
Both our mothers are here, acquaintances and companions
Each year we can celebrate a marriage reunion
I’m reminiscing on a former hour a tuxedo and bridal gown
Ravishing and lovely she is guaranteed to right any frown
Enveloped by affection guys and gals and the clan
Feels unbelievable completing this nuptial plan
Past tense a reference to reverence
Intense dazzling is her radiance
Loved Ones who attend our preference or not
Groundhog is this day tie the knot was the plot
Fusion is life, then gravity wins, radiant energy
A sliver of the spectrum, a scintillating reflection, eventually
Coming from distances as far as we can measure
An unanticipated phenomenon destined for pleasure
Where deviation can only come from what may not even be a force
Steady is the course, shifts of blue and red, power gain and loss
Obsessed only on (an) odyssey outdating origin (an) original
A particular particle’s perpetual pilgrimage’s pinnacle
Afraid again agenda attain an angel
Bona fide bombshell because bitten by betrayal
Candid conversation can certainly conceal conspiracy
Don't detach devise disclose discovery
Expect exception excuse examination
From fundamental feelings following frustration
Gifted gab God gave graciously
Humorous host humbled hush hypocrisy
Intentional indifference intercourse isolates identity
Jabber jive jaundice jealousy
Kitten knit king known knack knock knell
Loyalty lost languish looming look lose lapel
Make-up mutual motive mouth missing moue memento
Next nod neck no neglect negotiate narrow
Over ordinary opinion occur obligation obviously
Ponder peering proposals promised previously
Qualification quotes quality quest quit quietness
Relaxed really respect raving rough responsibilities recess
Soaring simultaneous serenity satisfied sheltered
Trips Ternate Tahiti tomorrow's treasured
United undertake uncharted uncertainty
Vast valuable venture valiantly verdict victory
Weather wretched winters worn while wiser, wright
Xyster xyston xenial Xenoblast Xerophyte
Ylem yeasayer yield yomi
Zero zen, zealous zee
Who doesn’t get salty in time
I made a little something to remind
When salty and you are the bearer
This necklace wearer just look in the mirror
And decipher the word
Why are you salty this is absurd
As dry earth scape’s harsh light, radiate heat
Long days dark nights, natures defeat
From my perspective they fall yearly, why
Bare branches, seems like things just die
For some it’s nice, weather the storm
The cold and ice, cozy and warm
Babies and bird sounds, light island breeze
Imagination deep in the fluffy clouds, relaxed at ease
Butterflies and bees prepare food and green trees
Sweet honey and fruit our needs indeed
Colors slowly drain away with the rains, no retreat
Only gloom remains, but now repeat
Love of my life
My knight your armor it shines so bright
From your wife I’m saying thank you
For slaying dragons like you do
You’re a virtuous lover by the way thanks for dinner
First in line to help the kids, I always knew you’re a winner
This glow on my face you are where it began
Your chiseled chest oh I can’t keep calm
I know you love me everyday
And everything will be ok
But when you gonna honnor what you say
And make me melt away
Love of my life
Hey there my knight your armor shines so bright
From your wife I’m saying thank you
For slaying dragons like you do
Hey, Love of my life
There’s my knight in armor shining so bright
From your wife I’m saying thank you
For loving me like you do
Adventuresomeness
Rhythmic rareness
Unique and upbeat
Live all now meet
Oldies lit unwrap
Hip skip jump tap
We dance space be
Interdisciplinary
The ocean color is blue to most eyes

raw_array.line: Tele you’ve got our vision listening to that funk
Entertaining always waiting it would seem
Loving that junk in the trunk
Escaping behind the walls into a dream
Verified groovy bass a taste of stardom
Impressive skills chill with the aristocrat
Stupendous if I will pick a term at random
I’m cool with that
Oh and the man in the TV easy
None other than a very handsome personality
It’s time for the ultimate test
On the wold stage is the best of the best
Some seem to show no stress
Tears from the practice
Train solstice to solstice
Hardy in the Japan heat like for a cactus
I won’t mention any names it’s all relative
I cheer for the country where I’m native
Dear I say some of their techniques are creative
Every four years the world watches this stage
2020 pandemic added 365 days to this story’s pages
Intensity on the faces almost looks like rage
Their physique and bodies so sleek
So many competitors and chances to win bleek
1896 and gift from the Greek
Just use the definition, a copout,  this seems absurd
But starting as a verb, here we go, may not be word for word
Discharge or drain away, excrete waste matter, a gross finding
Declare that last statement something not valid or legally binding
Now the noun may bring a frown so hold on to something or just sit down
A suit which in bridge and whist, your life, no cards dealt, facedown
Completely deserted space maybe in your heart
unfilled cavity in a wall, structure or building
An emptiness caused by the loss of something, or being apart
especially when your unwilling
The last qualifier is a modifier an adjective used to change the meaning
Of the preceding speech or action, that ineffectual and useless feeling
As a position that is vacant in an empty office
Free from or lacking form the hidden abyss
Told on a surface where the meaning goes around
Helps keep pace, for wonder, and taste profound
Well written on faces told by the ages
Growth in stages and the turning of pages
Calms down rages a hypnotizing pendulum
Dialed by the stars for a millennium
Analog gears turn to digital over the years
Now atomic not the radiation scares
I personally pored hours into a glass
Imagining the future reminiscing on the past
Stops on the horizon where our story ends
Lost in the meaning of the moment when we pretend
WHO said, the world can be stopped
Human transmission began to slow the clock
January: Start from the top, no it’s the first I mean, it’s scary
Country number one now under quarantine, this tiny adversary
February: Restrictions, public health, it’s an emergency
Now death’s exceeding a previous crisis’s quantity
March: WHO declares, the global prepares, a second wave an arch
Shut downs, stay at home orders and CARES start the march
April: "What do you have to lose?" take the Cocktail
Reopening the economy, in hindsight, epic fail
May: Underestimated terrible toll but At home tests are on the way
A vaccine deal should help the Ordinal death count decay
June: Studies canceled WHO will make the decision soon
Big business races, rise in cases, give the Task Force room
July: Record daily cases, WHO announces why
Now airborne, cover faces, low HEALS make us cry
August: An increase in mortality risk thus, now masks are a must
In benefits we don’t trust, plus, reinfection reported, this thing’s robust
September: A Global effort from WHO was rejected, do you remember
Phase 3 Trials on the horizon after halts, no surrender
October: More spikes, cases top 40 million, however
Progress plays and pauses a flickering ember
November: 100,000 cases a day sadly we are the offenders
Nationwide immunity would be our only defender
December: Authorizations for vaccinations soon for all a planetary member
But doses and distribution fall just short of splendor
2020 is done and gone, we didn’t win
It’s 2021, now let the transformation begin
Cause physics he said
Overwhelming exploded my head
A collaboration indeed
Now to make it clear Sohrab took the lead
Dynamic entry presented
Amazing as expected
Effecting the fluid’s molecules
Fascinating to eyes, energy in joules
Fancy for sure but there’s more
Explain the observed the lore
Considering what we saw
Transparent floating orb left us in awe
I recently had an event
Made me thing of the future
I know where all the time went
And this rift won’t require a suture
A once baby bird jump on the edge
And spread her wings, she’s flying
The time will come when they all fledge
I lament and stare at the ceiling denying
Now rearing and feeding I’m content
I learn love and teach
These blessings are heaven sent
So parents listen and protect as you preach
Each and every day each and every way
Make all the occasions precious filled with zest
Time travels only one way no shades of gray
Will I be prepared when this moment manifest
